title: Understanding Our Terms of Service | Help Center
article: When you use Fairly’s platform, the terms that apply depend on your role and the services you access. All users agree to our General Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy, which outline your rights and responsibilities, how we provide our services, and how your information is used and protected. In addition, specific terms apply based on your relationship with Fairly:- Owner Terms of Service apply to homeowners who list or manage properties on the platform. - Caretaker Terms of Service apply to individuals and companies who act as a caretaker for properties listed on Fairly. - Guest Terms of Service apply to guests who book or stay at properties listed on the Fairly platform. - Payments Services Terms govern the creation and use of custodial accounts for homeowner funds, processing of card payments for reservations, and other payment-related activities. If you interact with the platform in more than one role, the relevant terms apply to each activity.
claude_summary: Fairly's Terms of Service vary by user role. All users agree to General Terms and Privacy Policy, with additional specific terms for owners, caretakers, guests, and payment services.
